footer.ignoreIfNotExpected: If you were not expecting this email, you can ignore it.
footer.dontForward: Please don't forward this email to anyone.
footer.contactAdmin: If you were not expecting this email, please contact your organization administrator.
footer.billingAdmin: You received this email because you are a billing administrator for {organizationName} on {appName}.
footer.sentBy: This message was sent by {organizationName} via {appName}.

common.orCopyLink: or copy and paste this URL into your browser:

verifyEmail.subject: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.title: Email Verification
verifyEmail.body: To complete your account, you need to verify your email address.
verifyEmail.footer: If you don't want to verify your email or didn't request this, just ignore and delete this message. Please don't forward this email to anyone.

confirmEmailChange.subject: Confirm your email address change
confirmEmailChange.title: Confirm Email Change
confirmEmailChange.body: We received a request to change the email address for your account. Click the button below to confirm this change.
confirmEmailChange.footer: If you did not request this change, you can safely ignore this email. Your email address will remain unchanged.

passwordReset.subject: Reset password instructions
passwordReset.title: Reset Password
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset the password for your {appName} account. Click the button below to choose a new password.
passwordReset.footer: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

organizationInvitation.subject: Organization invitation
organizationInvitation.title: Join {organizationName} on {appName}
organizationInvitation.body: {invitedByName} ({invitedByEmail}) has invited you to join the {organizationName} organization on {appName}.
organizationInvitation.footer: If you were not expecting this invitation, you can ignore this email.

revokedInvitation.subject: Invitation revoked
revokedInvitation.preview: Your invitation to {organizationName} has been revoked
revokedInvitation.title: Invitation Revoked
revokedInvitation.body: Your invitation to join {organizationName} on {appName} has been revoked.
revokedInvitation.explanation: This means the invitation link you received previously is no longer valid. If you believe this is an error, please contact the organization administrator.
revokedInvitation.footer: If you were not expecting this invitation originally, you can safely ignore this email.

subscriptionCanceled.subject: Your {planName} subscription has been canceled
subscriptionCanceled.preview: Your {planName} subscription for {organizationName} has been canceled
subscriptionCanceled.title: Subscription Canceled
subscriptionCanceled.body: This email confirms that the subscription for {organizationName} has been canceled.
subscriptionCanceled.accessInfo: You will continue to have access to all {planName} features until {accessEndDate}. After this date, your organization will be moved to the free plan.
subscriptionCanceled.reactivate: If you change your mind, you can reactivate your subscription at any time before the access end date from your organization's billing settings.
subscriptionCanceled.feedback: We're sorry to see you go. If you have any feedback about your experience, we'd love to hear from you.

paymentFailed.subject: Payment failed for {organizationName} - Action required
paymentFailed.title: Payment Failed
paymentFailed.body: We were unable to process the payment for {organizationName}'s subscription.
paymentFailed.action: To avoid any interruption to your service, please update your payment method as soon as possible. Your subscription will remain active for a limited time while we retry the payment.
paymentFailed.footer: If you believe this is an error or have already updated your payment method, please disregard this email. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

trialEndingSoon.subject: Your {planName} trial ends in {daysText}
trialEndingSoon.preview: Your {planName} trial for {organizationName} is ending soon
trialEndingSoon.title: Your Trial is Ending Soon
trialEndingSoon.body: This is a reminder that your {planName} trial for {organizationName} ends on {trialEndDate}.
trialEndingSoon.daysRemaining: You have {daysRemaining, plural, one {1 day} other {{daysRemaining} days}} remaining.
trialEndingSoon.features: To continue enjoying all {planName} features, upgrade to a paid plan before your trial ends.
trialEndingSoon.footer: If you don't wish to continue after the trial, no action is required. Your organization will automatically be moved to the free plan.

disputeReceived.subject: URGENT: Dispute Received for {organizationName}
disputeReceived.preview: Payment dispute received - Immediate action required
disputeReceived.title: Payment Dispute Received
disputeReceived.alert: A payment dispute (chargeback) has been received for {organizationName}. This requires your immediate attention.
disputeReceived.urgency: It is crucial that you respond to this dispute before the evidence deadline. Failure to respond may result in automatically losing the dispute and loss of funds.
disputeReceived.footer: Payment disputes (chargebacks) can affect your account and reputation. Please take immediate action.
